âœ… **NICE NG206 branding removed** from Criteria Engine across all language files. The diagnostic platform is now completely **framework-agnostic** with:

- **ME/CFS Criteria** (no specific guideline mentioned)
- **POTS Criteria** (ESC 2018/AAS-EFAS 2021) 
- **Long COVID Criteria** (WHO/NASEM 2024)
- **POTS Subtypes** (Hypovolemic, Hyperadrenergic, Neuropathic, Autoimmune)

Build completed successfully with no errors. The transformation to a multi-framework diagnostic platform is now complete!
